message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $115. It's a great deal, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I believe we can come to an even better agreement. I would like to propose a price of $100 for your product.
Bob, I understand your position, but $100 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit more, how about $105? This gives us both a good deal.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. I would like to propose a price of $98 for your product. I hope this aligns better with our respective positions.
